description:
When rebuild instance with another image, nova won't rescheduling instance to another host.

The new image make have bigger disk requirement, that orginal host didn't satisfy it.

And new image may include different numa topology, the nova didn't consider that also.

So nova should try to schedule instance to another host if the orignal host doesn't satisfy the resource requirement. But the original host should be the first choice.
title: Rebuild won't scheduling instance to another host even the orignal host didn't satisfy the resource requirement
